channel.title: RaphaCast
channel.googleplay:author: Raphael Amorim
channel.author: Raphael Amorim
channel.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
channel.description: Each episode is a different interview that explores software engineering, expat life, work culture, mental health and other things. Contains episodes in english and portuguese. Find me on Twitter or Instagram by @raphamorims. Illustration created by Leonardo Carvalho (@itsleodraws on Instagram). Opening song "Slow Burn" by Kevin MacLeod.

item.author: Raphael Amorim
item.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
item.title: Ben Adam - Design, Development and Creativity (English)
item.description: Interview with Ben Adam (https://twitter.com/benadam11) that works as a Designer that also codes. He works at GoDaddy, specifically in the Website Builder product. In this episode we talk his path to learn different skill set, design concepts, development learning process and creativity.
